message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product! I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to get your hands on this valuable item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12000. This is a great deal, considering the product's worth to you is $10000. I'm confident you'll find it a worthwhile investment.

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value you see in the product, but I believe we can reach a more agreeable price. Considering the worth of the product to me is $10000, I would like to propose a price of $10500.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm still looking for a price that reflects the product's true value to me. Considering the worth of the product to me is $15000, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I propose a price of $11500. This is a fair compromise that I believe you'll find reasonable.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Given the worth of the product to me is $10000, I believe we can reach an agreement closer to that figure. I would like to propose a price of $11000.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your desire to get closer to the product's worth to you, but I'm still not willing to sell it for less than $13000. This is the minimum I'm willing to accept, considering the value it holds for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I propose a price of $12750. This is the best I can do, and I hope you'll consider it.
Thank you for your latest offer, Alice. While I understand the value you place on the product, I remain committed to staying within my budget. I would like to propose a price of $12000.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your commitment to staying within your budget, but I'm still not willing to sell the product for less than $14000. This is the minimum I'm willing to accept, considering the value it holds for me. I'm willing to make one more compromise, so I propose a price of $13800. This is the best I can do, and I hope you'll consider it.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts to accommodate my budget. I would like to propose a price of $13000.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your persistence, but I'm still not willing to sell the product for less than $14500. This is the minimum I'm willing to accept, considering the value it holds for me. I'm willing to make one more compromise, so I propose a price of $14250. This is the best I can do, and I hope you'll consider it.

Thank you for your final offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Given the worth of the product to me is $10000, I believe we can reach an agreement closer to that figure. I would like to propose a price of $13500.
